sentence.Network_en: And there are some strong intellectual arguments for universalism.

sentence.Network_en: Liberal universalism embodies individualistic basic spirit.
sentence.Network_cn: 自由主义普遍主义体现着个人主义的基本精神.

sentence.Network_en: Over the past twenty years, Unitarian Universalism has undergone a shift in consciousness.
sentence.Network_cn: 在过去的二十年, 唯一神教派的观念产生了转变.
